concept.title: Detecting a Weak Unit
concept.shortdesc: A systematic approach to identifying weak units involves testing unit position changes and checking multiple potential failure points before concluding the coil is at fault.

section.title: Primary Diagnostic Steps
section.p: When a cylinder shows signs of failure or weak performance:

ol.li: Change the unit's position to verify if the problem follows the unit
Listen for vibrator buzzing without spark at plug, which indicates a defective unit
